name: Monster Hordes
description:
'Monster Hordes' is a 5E compatible ruleset from Mythic Grove focused on building and streamlining the process of battling larger groups of monsters.  This supplement aims to help DM's run more massive encounters that challenge their players without tracking long lists of individual monster initiatives during combat. 

With  'Monster Hordes' you'll get a complete creation guideline detailing how to take a base creature and create your own horde, or take one of our 12 pre-made horde creatures and run wild with them. 

Published by Mythic Grove

https://www.mythicgroveproductions.com/
